message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I still think $120 is a more reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $140. Can we meet at this price?
